reviewText: The film was made by a veteran movie director, so it is well done ----with much footage of the man, both in the arena and at home---the bull fighting scenes are excellent in displaying his masterful style and dominance of the bulls--and we even see him demonstrate his dangerous "PENDULO" move where he causes the bull to veer off at the last second and pass  behind him as he swings the muleta from front to rear !
